findings.title: SVN-014 - Incorrect ecrecover return value checks
findings.description: The `castVoteBySig` function in the `GovernorAlpha` smart contract does not correctly check the return value of `ecrecover`, allowing votes to be cast with invalid signatures.

findings.title: SVN-015 - Shadowed declarations
findings.description: Shadowed declarations in Staking.sol and GovernorAlpha.sol contracts causing compile-time warnings.

findings.title: SVN-016 - Incorrect revert error message strings
findings.description: The error strings used in several functions in the Checkpoints smart contract are incorrect, as the error is caused by an overflow in the stake amount and not in the stake date as the string indicates.

findings.title: Shadowed declarations in Staking.sol and GovernorAlpha.sol contracts
findings.description: The `Staking.sol` and `GovernorAlpha.sol` contracts emit warnings at compile time caused by shadowed declarations.
